title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - London Stansted Airport - version 1.0 released
description:
In this addon spotlight we are going to look at London Stansted Airport (EGSS) version 1.0 which has been released a few days ago. This addon has been created by a community member and I am pretty impressed about the level of quality of this airport. If you are flying from the UK on a regular based using MSFS 2020 this is definitely an addon which you want to give a try.

If you want to give the airport a try yourself you can download it from the site below: 
https://flightsim.to/file/18965/london-stansted-airport-egss
